openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: unit test
  version: 0.0.1
components:
  schemas:
    employee:
      allOf: 
      - $ref: "#/components/schemas/doctor"
      - $ref: "#/components/schemas/nurse"
      
    nurse:
      properties:
        level:
          type: integer
        agreement:
          $ref: 'agreements.yml#/components/schemas/agreement'
      required:
      - level
      
    doctor:
      properties:
        income:
          type: number
        agreement:
          $ref: 'agreements.yml#/components/schemas/agreement'
      required:
      - income
